title: Zelenskyy urges UN to punish Russia for war crimes, saying troops 'killed anyone who served our country': Live Ukraine updates
content:
1. Zelenskyy urges UN to punish Russia for war crimes, saying troops 'killed anyone who served our country': Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  2. Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
  3. How could Vladimir Putin be prosecuted for war crimes?  The Guardian
  4. Opinion | The Bucha massacre marks grim turning point in Russia's war  The Washington Post
  5. Explainer: How could Russia's Putin be prosecuted for war crimes in Ukraine?  Reuters.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ゼレンスキー氏、国連にロシアの戦争犯罪を罰するよう要請 軍は「国に奉仕する者は誰でも殺した」と発言。ウクライナの最新情報
泽伦斯基敦促联合国惩处俄罗斯的战争罪行，称军队 "杀害了为我们国家服务的任何人"。乌克兰实时更新
澤倫斯基敦促聯合國懲處俄羅斯的戰爭罪行，稱軍隊 "殺害了爲我們國家服務的任何人"。烏克蘭實時更新
